name: Traintracker - A Satisfying track-laying game.
description:
Nothing is more satisfying than laying tracks. Nothing.

Your job is to lay railroad tracks, and get them to the end-point. You cant just mindlessly place them, you got to be strategic. Oh, and you need to pick up passengers as well.

Press space to start the game in the beginning. Full-screen recommended.






This game was made with PuzzleScript.
